desc.para: The GtkHScrollbar widget is a widget arranged horizontally creating a scrollbar. See GtkScrollbar for details on scrollbars.
You also might want to use a GtkAdjustment to specify the boundaries of the scrollbar.

note.para: If you want to add scrollbars to a GtkTextView or a GtkTreeView, you should use a GtkScrolledWindow.

desc.para: Creates a new horizontal scrollbar. If the adjustment parameter is omitted or set to null, an GtkAdjustment will be created for you. Since all of the adjustments values are set to 0, it might be easier and faster to construct the adjustment yourself.
